description:
Cold conditions call for extreme warmth. Whether you're skinning up in the backcountry, riding the chair lift, or shoveling the driveway, keeping your fingers warm is crucial. The thick, and recycled, Primaloft® Bio insulation wraps your hands in a layer of warmth while keeping useable materials out of the landfill.

  • Polyester shell for durable weather protection
  • Waterproof-breathable WaterGuard® membrane seals water out
  • Primaloft® Bio recycled polyester microfibre insulation offers 360 degrees of warmth
  • Synthetic leather palm is durable and grippy
  • Recycled fleece lining for added warmth and softness against the skin
  • Adjustable wrist strap and cuff drawcord seals out snow and drafts
name: Kombi Lift Mitts - Women's
